name: dfs.mover.moverThreads
description: Configure the balancer's mover thread pool size.

name: dfs.ha.tail-edits.namenode-retries
description: Number of retries to use when contacting the namenode when tailing the log.

name: dfs.namenode.name.cache.threshold
description:
Frequently accessed files that are accessed more times than this
    threshold are cached in the FSDirectory nameCache.

name: mapreduce.shuffle.pathcache.concurrency-level
description:
Uses the concurrency level to create a fixed number of hashtable
    segments, each governed by its own write lock.

name: hadoop.security.dns.log-slow-lookups.threshold.ms
description:
If slow lookup logging is enabled, this threshold is used to decide if a
    lookup is considered slow enough to be logged.

name: mapreduce.job.speculative.retry-after-no-speculate
description:
The waiting time(ms) to do next round of speculation
  if there is no task speculated in this round.

name: dfs.datanode.http.internal-proxy.port
description:
The datanode's internal web proxy port.
    By default it selects a random port available in runtime.

name: dfs.datanode.slowpeer.low.threshold.ms
description: Threshold in milliseconds below which a DataNode is definitely not slow.
